summary: Anyone had seen Rory lately? I mean Ser Roland Gilmore. He\'s been trying to locate the Grey Warden incarnate Dragonborn to relight their flame of love!
descriptionHtml:
Anyone had seen Rory lately? I mean Ser Roland Gilmore, the mighty knight from the Cousland origin of DAO. Ever since my gay Warden\'s soul got shouted from his body and transferred to the Skyrim, Rory\'s been torn and broken. So bad that Anders had to track down the Warden with the help of Justice (Thank you Aisaka for the \"Anders from Dragon Age companion and saved game by Aisaka\" mod! http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31346). Finally, Ser Gilmore reunites with the Warden! The face might have changed, the race may be different, but LOVE breaks boundaries and conquers all odds :) Let\'s continue their journey in Skyrim before Anders and Morrigan figure out how to transfer the love birds for DA3! 
**location** Frostfruit Inn in Rorikstead :)

Thank you Immortality for the epic mod, the best romance in DAO (Alistair: HEY!) :D
Ser Gilmore companion NPC - Fully Voiced by Immortality
http://dragonage.nexusmods.com/mods/851
Also thank you for Emerj\'s face mod to make the Rory even hotter!
Handsome Ser Gilmore Morph by Emerj
http://dragonage.nexusmods.com/mods/3314
U guys are inspirations of this Rory goes Skyrim mod XD! Oh well, I wish I have a voice like Rory\'s (mod) voice actor Jay
May be I should make custom dialogue to make the Dragonborn remembers his/her previous life as the Warden :) and relight the flame of love :D

U have to get  **Apachii skyhair for males** and  \"Apachii skyhair\" by Apachii for Rory\'s hair http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168/
Rory has no problem to get himself into the elite Imperial Penitus Oculatus with his experience in stopping the fifth blight. However, I highly recommand u to get the Bosmer Armor :D It\'s simple gorgeous!
Bosmer Armor Pack by Maty743
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/37289
author: icyhugs
